title: Just me, but shouldn't Yasuo gain flow when he dashes?
body:
And not an obscene amount like 20%, but shouldn't he gain SOME flow when he dashes? 

It always seems like he gains no flow when I dash as him, and it's really annoying :(

replies.body: Yasuo does still gain some flow when he uses E. It's nowhere near as much as he did on release, but he still gets some flow generation from the distance the dash moves him.

NO
I DON'T CARE IF IT MAKES SENSE NO
he used to but im pretty sure they removed that
Was removed to mantein double crit
Which also shouldn't be on his kit.
He used to but that was pretty broken. It's a good idea to give him flow on his dashes but they need to tone down the scaling of it IMO
